content:
Hello all,

I have a question about this API endpoint: /api/info/metrics/files/monthly
The Guide mentions for this API: 'monthly cumulative timeseries from first date of first entry to now' and 'eleased means only currently released dataset versions (not unpublished or DEACCESSIONED versions)'.

If i retrieve metrics from this endpoint for DataverseNL, I get as result a csv, with last entry:
2025-01 545,035

However, if I look up the total number of files in the UI, (by going to the root and using the facets to filter on published files only), I get a result of 220,553

How can this difference be explained?

Best wishes, Laura
It reminds me of this issue: Count of all file downloads from metrics API doesn't always match what's in UI (on old homepage metrics bar)Â #4970
@Laura Huis in 't Veld would you mind asking at https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community ? I feel like Jim might know what's going on but he isn't here on Zulip.

There is a thread from early this month:
https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/I_xLQ-s26DI/m/cna6kvwCBAAJ

Jim says UI is approximation.

And another from earlier last year:
https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/CVj5nG3EIhA/m/WcWzX-YFBQAJ
Thanks, Sherry, https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/8972 is the pull request from Jim that I was thinking of.
The thing about Laura's numbers is that they are vastly different.

Here is the link to the topic I started on the forum:
https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/WpCwfh1X6sM/m/q_HNKEx4BAAJ
